description: This file contains a series of unit tests for a React application, specifically testing the 'Collections' feature. It uses React Testing Library to simulate user interactions such as navigation, creating collections, adding recipes, and deleting collections, verifying the application's behavior and UI updates.

methods.name: wait(ms)
methods.description: Utility function to pause execution for a specified number of milliseconds, used to wait for asynchronous UI updates in tests.

ctags.name: wait
ctags.pattern: /^function wait(ms) { return new Promise(r => setTimeout(r, ms)); }$/
